item.title: ã€Thinking Elixir 292: Sage Advice for AI Agentsã€‘Thinking Elixir 292ï¼šç»™äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½ä»£ç†çš„æ˜æ™ºå»ºè®®
item.description:
ã€

Thinking Elixir 292: Sage Advice for AI Agents

17 Feb 2026 by brainlid

Episode 292 of Thinking Elixir. News includes Mark announcing his new Sagents library for building AI agents with human-in-the-loop oversight and real-time debugging capabilities, JosÃ© Valimâ€™s blog post on why Elixir is the best language for AI based on recent completion rate studies, LiveDebugger v0.6.0 with custom events and enhanced exception handling, an analysis of Elixir developer salaries showing US senior remote positions at ~$163k median, Peter Ullrichâ€™s new MCP server implementation for Elixir, a revamp of Lua for Elixir with improved tooling, Elixir Hubâ€™s new events section for finding conferences and meetups, and a discussion on whether AI advancements like Opus 4.6 are eliminating the SDK advantage of more popular languages, and more!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H1iyBresVkM

View on ElixirStatus

item.title: ã€From 34% to 96%: The Porting Initiative Delivers - Hologram v0.7.0ã€‘ä» 34% åˆ° 96%ï¼šç§»æ¤è®¡åˆ’äº¤ä»˜ - Hologram v0.7.0
item.description:
ã€

From 34% to 96%: The Porting Initiative Delivers - Hologram v0.7.0

12 Feb 2026 by bartblast

Hologram v0.7.0 has been released. 49 contributors ported 150 Erlang functions to JavaScript, pushing client-side Erlang runtime coverage from 34% to 96% and overall Elixir standard library readiness from 74% to 87%. More here: https://hologram.page/blog/porting-initiative-delivers-hologram-v0-7-0

item.title: ã€Thinking Elixir 291: From 2x Compilation to Junior Comprehensionã€‘æ€è€ƒçµè¯291ï¼šä»äºŒæ¬¡ç¼–è¯‘åˆ°åˆçº§é¢†æ‚Ÿ
item.description:
ã€

Thinking Elixir 291: From 2x Compilation to Junior Comprehension

10 Feb 2026 by brainlid

Episode 291 of Thinking Elixir. News includes JosÃ© Valim announcing another major compilation time improvement coming to Elixir v1.20 achieving 2x speedup while adding the type checker, a new alternative Erlang syntax called Telelang, Membraneâ€™s YOLO plugin bringing AI-powered object detection to video pipelines, Christian Alexanderâ€™s Claude Skill for automating dependency updates through AI conversation, JosÃ© Valimâ€™s experimental PR Quiz tool that transforms code reviews into interactive learning experiences inspired by Anthropic research on AI coding skills, legal changes to US SBOM requirements, AshPartition for database partitioning, building containers directly from Erlang/Elixir code, and the complete ElixirConf EU speaker lineup featuring 39 speakers plus keynotes from JosÃ© Valim and Chris McCord!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Makf80ZonZA

View on ElixirStatus

Thinking Elixir ç¬¬ 291 é›†ã€‚æ–°é—»åŒ…æ‹¬ JosÃ© Valim å®£å¸ƒ Elixir v1.20 çš„å¦ä¸€é¡¹é‡å¤§ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶é—´æ”¹è¿›ï¼Œåœ¨æ·»åŠ ç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥å™¨çš„åŒæ—¶å®ç°äº† 2 å€çš„åŠ é€Ÿï¼Œä¸€ç§åä¸º Telelang çš„æ–°æ›¿ä»£ Erlang è¯­æ³•ï¼ŒMembrane çš„ YOLO æ’ä»¶å°† AI é©±åŠ¨çš„å¯¹è±¡æ£€æµ‹å¼•å…¥è§†é¢‘ç®¡é“ï¼ŒChristian Alexander çš„ Claude Skill é€šè¿‡ AI å¯¹è¯è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»ï¼ŒJosÃ© Valim çš„å®éªŒæ€§ PR Quiz å·¥å…·ï¼Œè¯¥å·¥å…·å°†ä»£ç å®¡æŸ¥è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå— AI äººç±»ç ”ç©¶å¯å‘çš„äº¤äº’å¼å­¦ä¹ ä½“éªŒç¼–ç æŠ€èƒ½ã€ç¾å›½ SBOM è¦æ±‚çš„æ³•å¾‹å˜æ›´ã€ç”¨äºæ•°æ®åº“åˆ†åŒºçš„ AshPartitionã€ç›´æ¥ä» Erlang/Elixir ä»£ç æ„å»ºå®¹å™¨ï¼Œä»¥åŠå®Œæ•´çš„ ElixirConf EU æ¼”è®²è€…é˜µå®¹ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åŒ…æ‹¬ 39 åæ¼”è®²è€…ä»¥åŠ JosÃ© Valim å’Œ Chris McCord çš„ä¸»é¢˜æ¼”è®²ï¼

item.description:
ã€

DeltaQuery: Simple Delta Sharing for Elixir

5 Feb 2026 by stuartjohnpage

Iâ€™m excited to announce the open-source release of Delta Query! This library allows Elixir developers to query Delta Sharing sources, and handles the filtering and parsing of parquet files so you can just get on with working with your data.

https://revelry.co/insights/elixir-delta-sharing-with-delta-query/
